We need to implement improved recruitment, hiring, and promotion practices that are dedicated to having officers that are relentlessly pursuing the service of not the community, but our community. It’s about no, not dividing us, but uniting us and understand that we come from the community.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Chief Dooley
transcription: We need to enhance the ability for police agencies to implement effective discipline. We need to make sure that we have policies that establish a framework for a community policemen engagement, that fully embraces that police officers serve, protect and connect everyone in our community so that we all can become better.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Chief Dooley
transcription: We need training. This is not the time to defund police departments. When an organization or a business is struggling to be better now is not the time to take away those resources. You provide them, and you hold them accountable, and you set expectations and you manage them so they can be better. That’s what you do. We need more training. We need more specific training that’s dedicated to service of those that everyone we enact with on a daily basis. Those that are homeless, those that suffer from mental illness, those that need food. Okay? We need the training to be able to connect those people we interact with, with those that can provide those services. That’s what we need in this country. I want to end with just these few thoughts. I have a very simple saying to my officers that we serve protect and connect, and together is better. And as I look around this room, I know that together we will become better and we will take this country to great levels under the leadership of Donald Trump.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Thank you [inaudible 01:28:29], thank you. Thank you. Thank you very much, that’s beautiful. So it’s time to say goodbye. But we’ll be back, we’ll be back. And I just want to thank Bishop. You’ve been my friend for a long time, and I appreciate everything you’ve done and everything you’ve said. A great unifying source of strength and everything else and I appreciate it very much.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: Thank you. Can I add one last thing?
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Please.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: Before you leave?
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Please.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: I’m tired of people blaming the current administration and others in our generation. These problems began many years ago. And what has been exciting to me is, was a church that began the abolitionist movement. It was the church and whites and blacks working together that started the NAACP. It didn’t have a black leader at the beginning at the time. It was the church that led through in the civil rights movement.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: So I want to offer you my support in these listening sessions. In that the church needs to come together. I believe we can unify better than any group. And what we’re looking for you to do is to give structural guidance what you’re working on. And you’ve already brought forth some amazing things. But I want to affirm that Democrats can kneel down, and wear kente cloth, and stop black pain.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: Republicans can’t take some one time act and stop that black pain. But I believe we’ve got a man here who’s courageous enough-
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Speaker 12
transcription: Yes.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: … to begin something that’s tough.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Speaker 12
transcription: Yes.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: And that we’re going to this time heal. And so I weep over this. I pray for you as you know.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Thank you.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: And we believe that we’re going to get it right. I’m going to say one last thing, I lost of my late wife a couple years ago. I found out in dealing with her that sometimes you just got to listen, feel her pain. If you try to fix it too early, you’re going to make a mistake. Sure listening sessions are wise, because it’s going to give that cathartic process a chance.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: So I don’t want to take up too much time, sir. But I wanted to say that the people here, I challenge you. Christians, black, white, Asian, let’s come together and let’s provide a safety net. And then we’ll work with business and then we’ll work along with the administration. But don’t push them out here up front and say, “Fix it now, fix it now, fix it now, fix it now.” Because it’s never worked that way.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: That’s good.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Bishop Jackson
transcription: Thank you, sir.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Thank you very much. Appreciate it. Thank you very much. Thank you very much [inaudible 01:31:46]. Fantastic job [inaudible 01:31:48] .
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Thank you everybody. Thank you very much. Thank you.
headlin: Donald Trump Roundtable Meeting Transcript on Justice Disparities in America
